name: The Growthful Skisles
description:
The Growthful Skisles is a peaceful sandbox game that takes place in a sky of floating islands where you can build, grow plants, and explore the procedural generated islands.

=Controls=

Left Arrow - Move Left/Cursor Left

Right Arrow - Move Right/Cursor Right

Up Arrow - Jump/Cursor Up

Down Arrow - Cursor Down

Z - Enter Build Mode

X - Break/Place Objects

A - Scroll Left

S - Scroll Right

This game was made for GBJAM 7 and tries to emulate the feel and restrictions of the Game Boy.
